availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Letter] 1838 Feb. 1, Nashville, Tennessee [to] Governor McNutt, Jackson, Mississippi / Newton Cannon
bibl.author: Cannon, Newton
bibl.note: This document is a letter dated February 1, 1838 from governor Alexander G. McNutt of Mississippi, to the governor of Tennessee, Newton Cannon. The purpose of the letter is the marking of the boundary line between the states of Tennessee and Mississippi.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p: Some two or three months ago. I enclosd enclosed to Gov Governor Lynch your predecessor in office a copy of the act of the general assembly of Tennessee on the subject of the establishment of the Boundary recently run & marked by the commissioners of our States In order that it might if deemd deemed expedient, be also brought before the Legislature of Mississippi But I have not as yet been informd informed of its reception, or what has been done by your Legislature of whose action on this Subject. I would be glad to receive official information at the earliest convenient time

closer.add: Very respectfully I have the honor to be your obt Servt obedient servant
His Excellency N Cannon a letter in relation to the boundary line between the states of Tennessee and Mississippi

address.addrLine: Excellency Governor McNutt Jackson state of Mississippi

closer.add: Newton Governor February 1st 1838 Received Feby 11th Boundary line
